title: US halts immigration processing for 19 nations
description: The US government is suspending all immigration requests from 19 countries, saying it is tightening national security screenings. Critics have warned that this will leave thousands of people in legal limbo. The US government on Tuesday suspended the processin…
content:
The US government on Tuesday suspended the processing of all immigration applications from 19 countries in Africa, Asia and the Middle East.
